chapter.title: Raising a Dependency
chapter.p: Dependencies can only be raised within a project. To raise a dependency, open the card that you would like to associate the new dependency with and click on the + icon in the Dependencies section.

bullets.item: Description: Enter any requirements or additional details regarding the dependency here. The description can also be edited once the dependency has been created.
Desired completion date: Enter the date that you would like to see the dependency resolved by. This helps the resolving project understand the timeline when accepting dependencies.
Project: Select the project that you would like to raise the dependency on.

chapter.p: Once you've created the new dependency, it will appear on the card that it was raised on. You will be able to access the dependency by clicking the dependency name. There will also be a dependency icon on the card wall indicating the status of the dependency.
Click here to view dependency icon indicators definitions.
